meaningMnemonic: Did you know that your <kanji>crotch</kanji> is <kanji>connected</kanji> via various <kanji>joint</kanji>s? That makes this word your <vocabulary>hip joints</vocabulary> or, more generally, just your <vocabulary>hip</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
